MESSAGES.START: 🕌 As-salamu alaykum, dear user! You are connected to the greatest blessing — the Holy Qur’an. Each verse is light for the heart, guidance for life, and peace for the soul. Now you can read the Qur’an every day little by little — with Arabic text, transliteration, and translation. ➡️ To begin, press the button «📖 Start Lesson». 📿 May Allah accept your intention and increase your rewards!
MESSAGES.ABOUT: 🟢 About the Bot This bot keeps you connected with the Qur’an. Every day at 19:00, you will receive one verse — with Arabic text, transliteration, and well-known translations. 📖 Reading starts from the beginning of the Qur’an, and through each lesson you will: – Learn to read correctly, – Understand the meaning, – Reflect through different translations. This is a spiritual journey awakening your heart with the Qur’an. Every letter is a reward, every day is a blessing!
MESSAGES.SEARCH_AYAH: 📖 Ayah Search Guide To search for a verse, type in the following format: Surah:Ayah ✅ Examples: - 1:1 — Surah 1, Ayah 1 - 2:255 — Surah 2, Ayah 255 ⚠️ Note: - Surah number must be between 1 and 114 - Ayah number must not exceed the maximum in that surah - Only the : symbol is allowed between numbers
